projects.author: MAYA (SURNAME)
projects.title:
Unleashing the Potential of L-Antika:
Elevating the Card Deck Experience
projects.description: Anthea's project, L-Antika, is all about bringing traditional Maltese games back to life. With a redesigned deck of cards inspired by the Maltese landscape, and a prototype mobile app that gamifies the archival of playing card games, Anthea aims to bridge the gap between traditional games and the community. Not only will you enhance your card-playing experience with L-Antika, but you'll also learn about how Maltese people spent their time in the past, while having fun in the present! Get ready to level up your game night with L-Antika!
